      • getClients

        public Client[] getClients()
        Name: getClients. returns an array of clients.
        Returns:
        clients[].

      • registerClient

        public void registerClient(int clientNumber,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String commercialRegister,
                           Date date,
                           int type,
                           double qKgTransported,
                           double totalPaid)
        Name: registerClient. registrates a new client, creates an object Client and adds it to the ship clients array. pre the array clients must be defined. pre the cliet number must represent a valid and empty possition in the clients array.
        Parameters:
        clientNumber - must be in between one and Q_CLIENTS . clientNumber > 0 && clientNumber <= Q_CLIENTS .
        name - the String name must be != null, and name must be != "".
        commercialRegister - the String commercialRegister must be != null, and commercialRegister must be != "".
        date - the Date date must be != null, it must be a date grater than the current date.
        type - the type must be in between one and four. type >0 && type <= 4.
        qkgTransported - must be in between cero and MAX_VALUE. qkgTransported >= 0 && qkgTransported <= MAX_VALUE.
        totalPaid - must be in between cero and MAX_VALUE. totalPaid >= 0 && totalPaid <= MAX_VALUE.

      • getShipments

        public java.util.ArrayList<Load> getShipments()
        Name: getShipments. returns the shipments, wich is an arraylist of loads. pre ArrayList Shipments must be previously defined and != null.
        Returns:
        ArrayList shipments.

      • shippingPossibility

        public boolean shippingPossibility()
        Name: shippingPossibility. checks if the ship meets the requirements to sail, and then returns a trut value. it can sail = true, cant sail = false. pre the arraylist shipments must be defined. pre the method getWareWeight() must return a number >= 0
        Returns:
        shippingPossibility.

      • orderValidity

        public boolean orderValidity(int qBoxes,
                             double weightOfBoxes,
                             int type)
        Name: orderValidity. checks if the order meets the requirements to be added as a load to the current ship shioments and then returns a trut value, if is valid to add the order: true, else: false
        Parameters:
        qBoxes - must be in between one and MAX_VALUE. qBoxes > 0 && qBoxes <= MAX_VALUE.
        weightOfBoxes - must be in between cero (not including cero) and 28000, weightOfBoxes > 0, weightOfBoxes <= 28000
        type - must be in between one and tree. type > 0, type < = 3. pre he method getWareWeight() must return a number >= 0. pre the arraylist shipments must be defined.
        Returns:
        orderValidity.

      • loadShip

        public void loadShip(Load shipment)
        Name: loadShip. adds a Load object, shipment, to the shipments arrayList.
        Parameters:
        shipments - must be != null pre the arraylist shipments must be defined.

      • unloadOrder

        public void unloadOrder(int order)
        Name: unloadOrder. removes an objet Load from the shipments arrayList.
        Parameters:
        order - must represent a valid index in the arrayList shipments therefore it must be in between cero and shipments arrayList size. order >= 0 && order < shipments.size(). pre the arraylist shipments must be defined. and its size needs to be greater than 0. shipments.size() > 0.

      • unloadShip

        public void unloadShip()
        Name: unloadShip. removes all the objets Load from the shipments arrayList. pre the arraylist shipments must be defined.
